title: Topic 001 Question 146
body: Your security team wants to reduce the risk of user-managed keys being mismanaged and compromised. To achieve this, you need to prevent developers from creating user-managed service account keys for projects in their organization. How should you enforce this?
options: Configure Secret Manager to manage service account keys.
Enable an organization policy to disable service accounts from being created.
Enable an organization policy to prevent service account keys from being created.
Remove the iam.serviceAccounts.getAccessToken permission from users.
